llm_res.rule: Transfer function should revert on failure if the sender does not have enough balance.
The function `symbol()` should return the symbol of the token. This method can be used to improve usability, but interfaces and other contracts MUST NOT expect these values to be present.
State-changing functions should not necessarily return a boolean unless explicitly handling errors internally.
The function `name()` should return the name of the token. This method can be used to improve usability, but interfaces and other contracts MUST NOT expect these values to be present.
